title: (x) Bold script-like Scorch! Brolt! - Balloon {Jan E}
content:
Hey, looking for this typeface; I came close with Flash but it looks like there is a more simplified variation.

Example: [http://images.gfx.no/460/460728/1776829-564x376.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828113856/http:/images.gfx.no/460/460728/1776829-564x376.jpg "http://images.gfx.no/460/460728/1776829-564x376.jpg")  
And its used unsuspectingly on this store: [http://www.louisvilleghs.com/GhostMart/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828113856/http:/www.louisvilleghs.com/GhostMart/ "http://www.louisvilleghs.com/GhostMart/")

Thanks.

 [‹ (x) Archer Farms Organic Cereal package - Coquette, Eagle, DIN, Steelplate Gothic {Lex, Rainer}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828113856/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44434 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) PR sign on pedestrian route - Arial {Lex} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828113856/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44429 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mcmillions
